meanings.sent1: The uncoalesced puzzle pieces were scattered on the table.
meanings.sent2: The uncoalesced clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The uncoalesced group of friends struggled to agree on a movie to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts remained uncoalesced, like scattered fragments of a dream.
meanings.sent5: The uncoalesced colors of the painting clashed in a chaotic display.

meanings.sent1: The uncoalesced flavors of the dish left a strange taste in his mouth.
meanings.sent2: The uncoalesced voices in the choir practice sounded dissonant.
meanings.sent3: The uncoalesced ingredients in the recipe resulted in a failed attempt at baking.
meanings.sent4: Their uncoalesced opinions on the matter led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent5: The uncoalesced scents of the garden mingled in a confusing mix.

meanings.sent1: The uncoalesced nations struggled to find common ground.
meanings.sent2: The uncoalesced factions within the group caused internal conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The uncoalesced efforts of the team led to a lack of progress.
meanings.sent4: His uncoalesced emotions made it hard for him to make a decision.
meanings.sent5: The uncoalesced elements of the design clashed in an unappealing way.
